name: Diehard Doughnut
description:
Diehard Doughnut is a short 2.5d run-n-gun made for Mini Jam 56

You play as the Diehard Doughnut himself as he infiltrates the enemy base to take down the evil Churro Commander. Be sure to take down his minions and acquire power-ups along the way.

Controls:
Left: A or Left Arrow Key
Right: D or Right Arrow Key
Crouch: S or Down Arrow Key
Aim Up: W or Up Arrow Key
Shoot: Ctrl, Shift, Alt, or Enter
Jump: Space
